{{include document="Demarches.Code.Macros"/}} {{velocity}} #set($displayDocTitle = false) #set($displayTitleContentSeparator = false) #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use($doc.fullName)) #if ($isGuest) (%class='row demarches-titlerow'%)((( (%class='container'%)((( (%class='demarches-headline'%) = $services.localization.render('wikidemarches.home.subtitle') = (%class='demarches-explanation narrow-width'%) $services.localization.render('wikidemarches.home.explanation') (%class='seemore-button-container'%) [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.observatoire.button')>>observatoire.WebHome||class='btn btn-primary']] ))) ))) #else (% class='row demarches-searchrow' %) ((( (% class='container' %) ((( (%class='demarches-headline'%) = Mon tableau de bord = (% class='row' %) ((( (% class='col-xs-12 h4' %) ((( Rechercher une démarche existante ))) (% class='col-xs-12' %) ((( ## display the global search here: {{html clean='false'}} ## include custom search suggest, that is properly layouted WRT the form for which it's displayed ## $searchSuggestConfigHash is computed in the skin, in javascript.vm #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('Main.CustomSearchSuggestSSX')) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('Main.CustomSearchSuggestJSX', {'h' : $searchSuggestConfigHash.hashCode()}))
{{/html}} ))) ))) ))) ))) #end ## ## #if (!$isGuest) (%class='row demarches-mydemarchesrow'%)((( (%class='container'%)((( ## ## regular logged in users see the demarches they're porteurs of ## #set ($userMatch1 = ",$services.model.serialize($xcontext.userReference, 'default'),") #set ($userMatch2 = ",$services.model.serialize($xcontext.userReference, 'compact'),") #set ($hql = "select doc.fullName from XWikiDocument as doc, BaseObject as obj, LargeStringProperty as owners where obj.name = doc.fullName and obj.className='Demarches.Code.DemarchesClass' and owners.id.id = obj.id and owners.id.name = 'proprietaires' and (concat(',', owners.value, ',') like :um1 or concat(',', owners.value, ',') like :um2)") #set ($ownedDemarches = $services.query.hql($hql).bindValue('um1', "%${userMatch1}%").bindValue('um2', "%${userMatch2}%").execute()) (% class='row' %) ((( (% class='col-xs-12 col-sm-6' %) ((( == $services.localization.render('wikidemarches.owned-demarches') == ))) (% class='col-xs-12 col-sm-6' %) ((( (% class='howto-button-container' %) ((( (% class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true" %) ((())) [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.owned-demarches.howto')>>je-donne-mon-avis.WebHome]] ))) ))) ))) (% class='row' %) ((( (% class='col-xs-12 %) ((( #if ($ownedDemarches && $ownedDemarches.size() > 0) ## prepare the demarches map, with sort key, case insensitive and accents insensitive #set ($ownedDemarchesToDisplay = []) #foreach ($entry in $ownedDemarches) #set ($demarchePage = $xwiki.getDocument($entry)) #set ($demarcheObject = $demarchePage.getObject('Demarches.Code.DemarchesClass')) #set ($discard = $ownedDemarchesToDisplay.add({'fullname' : $entry, 'title' : $demarchePage.title, 'ministeres' : $demarcheObject.ministeres, 'sortkey' : $stringtool.stripAccents($demarchePage.title.toLowerCase())})) #end #foreach ($entry in $sorttool.sort($ownedDemarchesToDisplay, 'sortkey')) * (% class="demarche" %) ((( (% class="demarche-content" %) ((( [[$entry.title>>$entry.fullname]] (% class='ministeres' %) $entry.ministeres ))) {{html clean="false"}}
{{/html}} ))) #end #else * (% class="no-demarche" %) $services.localization.render('wikidemarches.owned-demarches.none') #end ))) ))) (% class='row-flex' %) ((( $services.localization.render('wikidemarches.demande.demarche-absente') (% class='button-container' %) [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.demande.creation')>>Demarches.Code.NewDemarche||class='btn btn-default']] ))) ))) ))) #end ## ## #set($isAdminMin = $hasAdmin || $isAdministrateurMinisteriel) #if ($isAdminMin) #set ($demarchesListPage = $xwiki.getDocument('Demarches.WebHome').URL + "?statut=active#|t=demarches&statut=active$directionFilter") (%class='row demarches-administrationrow'%)((( (%class='container' %)((( (%class='demarches-administration-link'%) ((( == $services.localization.render('wikidemarches.administration.home-title') == (%class='row-flex' %)((( [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.administration.demarches.home-link')>>path:$demarchesListPage||class='btn btn-default]] #if ($hasAdmin) [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.administration.avis.home-link')>>Avis.WebHome||class='btn btn-default']] #end [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.administration.ministeres.home-link')>>Ministeres.WebHome||class='btn btn-default']] [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.administration.directions.home-link')>>Directions.WebHome||class='btn btn-default']] [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.administration.publics.home-link')>>Publics.WebHome||class='btn btn-default']] [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.administration.evenements.home-link')>>Evenements.WebHome||class='btn btn-default']] #if ($hasAdmin) [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.administration.tools')>>Administration.WebHome||class='btn btn-default']] #end [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.administration.tableaudebord')>>TableauDeBord.WebHome||class='btn btn-default']] ))) ))) ))) ))) #end ## ## #if ($isGuest) (% class='row demarches-evalrow' %) ((( #set($evalHelpDoc = $xwiki.getDocument('Main.Comment-ca-marche')) (% class='container' %) ((( (% class='row evalrow-header' %) ((( (% class='col-xs-12 col-sm-6' %) == ${evalHelpDoc.title} == (% class='col-xs-12 col-sm-6' %) Nous avons recensé les 250 démarches administratives les plus utilisées par les usagers et nous avons établi des indicateurs qui nous permettent de suivre l’avancée de la dématérialisation, et l'expérience usager de façon très concrète. ))) {{display reference='$evalHelpDoc.fullName' /}} (% class='seemore-button-container' %) [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.indicatorsrow.button')>>Aide.Observatoire||class='btn btn-default']] ))) ))) #else (% class='row demarches-indicatorsrow' %) ((( (% class='container' %) ((( (% class='row' %) ((( (% class='col-xs-12' %) ((( == Les 250 démarches suivies par l’Observatoire == Nous avons recensé les 250 démarches administratives les plus utilisées par les usagers et nous avons établi des indicateurs qui nous permettent de suivre l’avancée de la dématérialisation, et l'expérience usager de façon très concrète. (% class='buttons-container' %) ((( (% class='boutton-container %) [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.observatoire.button')>>observatoire.WebHome||class='btn btn-primary']] (% class='boutton-container %) [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.indicatorsrow.button')>>Aide.Observatoire||class='btn btn-default']] ))) ))) ))) ))) ))) #end ## ## #if ($isGuest) (% class='row demarches-usagerow' %)((( (% class='container' %)((( (% class='row' %)((( (% class='col-xs-12 col-sm-6' %) ((( (% class='usagerow-header' %) ==Vous êtes porteur ou porteuse d’un service public numérique ?== (% class='usagerow-description' %) Même si votre démarche n’est pas parmi les 250 suivies dans l’Observatoire, vous pouvez utiliser l’outil Je donne mon avis afin de suivre en temps réel la satisfaction des usagers. (% class='seemore-button-container' %) [[$services.localization.render('wikidemarches.usagerow.button')>>je-donne-mon-avis.WebHome||class='btn btn-default']] ))) (% class='col-xs-12 col-sm-6 usagerow-col-img' %) ((( image:je-donne-mon-avis.WebHome@example-stats.svg ))) ))) ))) ))) #end ## ## (%class='row demarches-morerow'%)((( #set($afterHelpDoc = $xwiki.getDocument('Main.Et-apres')) (%class='container'%)((( (%class='row narrow-width'%)((( (%class='col-xs-12'%)((( (%class='narrow-width'%) ==${afterHelpDoc.title}== {{display reference='$afterHelpDoc.fullName' /}} ))) ))) ))) ))) {{/velocity}}
